text: Niscaya amara apanara nikata ohi prerana karechilama [1], yemana nuha o tara parabarti nabiganera prati ohi prerana karechilama [2], ara ibarahima, isama'ila, isahaka, iyaâ€™kuba o tara bansadharagana, isa, a'i'uba, i'unusa, haruna o sula'imanera nikata'o ohi prerana karechilama ebam da'udake pradana karechilama yabura
